General.Name: Suzhou Mingzhi Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Suzhou Mingzhi Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the design, production, sale, and related services of casting equipment, and casting accessories and products in the People's Republic of China. It provides core shop products, which includes core shooters; gassing units; sand preparation systems; permanent molds, semi permanents molds, fixtures, and core boxes, as well as the in line, core centers, and inorganic process core production solutions. The company also offers aluminum casting including core and casting development services. In addition, it provides manufacturing and sale of molds; processing and sale of mechanical parts; ferrous and non-ferrous metal casting; and engages in research and development of new material technology, as well as industrial design services including technology development, consultation, exchange, transfer, and promotion. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Suzhou, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No. 1999 West Tongxiao Road, Suzhou, China, 215216
